description:
## Welcome
Welcome to the SIoTRx basic tutorial! Here you will learn everything you need to create mappings with SIoTRx.

## Theory
***Providers*** are the first extension of SIoTRx over FreeMarker. They allow access to data sources without dealing with the complexity of protocols.

They can be used with the ***providers***( *type*, *argument*) function. The provider must be assigned to a variable in order to retrieve information from a data source.
```
<#assign argument = "specified by provider type">
<#assign data=providers("type", argument)>
```
More information about types of providers can be found in the provider tour.
## Hands-on
### Task
In this case, we will use the ***URLProvider*** type whose argument must be a JSON with the key "url" and value the url where the file is located. Complete the template in order to print the data from the specified URL.

<#-- Use this url in the argument: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-ecosystem/main/resources/mappings-data/01%20_SIoTRx_basic_tutorial/locations.json -->
<#assign argument = "">
<#assign data="">
[=data]
